title: Longhorns Daily News : Former Texas S Brandon Jones reportedly intends to sign with Denver Broncos
body_text:
Former Texas Longhorns safety Brandon Jones—most recently a member of the Miami Dolphins—intends to sign with the Denver Broncos, Bleacher Report recently reported.
Longhorns Daily News: Former Texas S Brandon Jones reportedly intends to sign with Denver Broncos
Plus: Texas WBB advances in Big 12 Tournament
